parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: Probably a fuller form of rheo; an alternate for epo in certain tenses; to utter, i.e. Speak or say.
Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
A young tender shoot, then: a branch; met: of descendants. From klao; a twig or bough.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To break off. From ek and klao; to exscind.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: To graft in, ingraft. From en and a derivative of kentron; to prick in, i.e. Ingraft.
